title: Number of retail chains in Poland 2019 , by sector
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of retail chains for 18 number of Retail Categoriess.
The Number of retail chains is appeared to be the highest at Retail Categories Fashion & Clothing and lowest at Retail Categories Pet Care.
There is a difference of 52.0 between the maximum Retail Categories Fashion & Clothing and minimum Retail Categories Pet Care.
min_summary: This bar chart has 18 columns on the x axis representing Retail Categories, and Number of retail chains in each Retail Categories on the y axis.
The Number of retail chains is highest at Retail Categories Fashion & Clothing and lowest at Retail Categories Pet Care.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of retail chains for 18 number of Retail Categoriess.
The Number of retail chains is appeared to be the highest at Retail Categories Fashion & Clothing and lowest at Retail Categories Pet Care.
There is a difference of 52.0 between the maximum Retail Categories Fashion & Clothing and minimum Retail Categories Pet Care.
max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of retail chains for 18 number of Retail Categoriess.
The maximum Number of retail chains 57.0 is found at Retail Categories Fashion & Clothing and the minimum is found at Pet Care where Retail Categories is 5.0.
Retail Categories Footwear & Leather has the second highest value for Number of retail chains.
The highest Retail Categories Fashion & Clothing has 52.0 more Number of retail chains than the lowest Retail Categories Pet Care.

Retail Categories Fashion & Clothing is higher than any other Retail Categoriess with value 57.0, followed by Footwear & Leather, and Footwear & Leather. Down to Retail Categories Pet Care with the lowest value 5.0.
Retail Categories Toys & Games, Petrol, and Jewelry & Watches have a similar Number of retail chains that is 12.0.
The Retail Categories Pet Care tends to be 3.18 percent lower than average.
The Number of retail chains is 323.0 if we add up values of all Retail Categoriess.
